definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: Octopus oracle Paul is predicting Germany will be defeated by Spain at the World Cup semifinal.
sentences.chinese: 八爪魚保羅推測德國在半決賽中將被西班牙戰勝。

sentences.english: They got knocked out in the semi's, battered actually, end of.
sentences.chinese: 他們在半決賽中被淘汰了，而且被碾得粉碎。

sentences.english: Semi-finals of the "Mr. American" Contest were held last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上星期日舉行了“美國先生”半決賽。

sentences.english: Japan defeated Sweden in the other semifinal game.
sentences.chinese: 另一場半決賽中，日本隊擊敗了瑞典隊。

sentences.english: Rhys also hit winners in last season's Premier Academy League Semi-Final and Final.
sentences.chinese: 里斯同樣在青年聯賽的半決賽和決賽上也有不俗表現。

sentences.english: My baseball team has qualified for the state semi-final.
sentences.chinese: 我們棒球隊有資格進入半決賽。

sentences.english: At Villarreal he was a UEFA Cup semi-finalist.
sentences.chinese: 在比利亞雷亞爾他是聯盟杯半決賽成員。

sentences.english: He faced teammate Chen Jin in the semi-finals and beat him handily in two sets.
sentences.chinese: 半決賽中，他直落兩盤，輕鬆擊敗隊友陳金。

sentences.english: Our team got creamed in the semi-finals so we din’t win a trophy.
sentences.chinese: 我們隊在幾個半決賽中遭受重挫，沒有贏到獎牌。

sentences.english: Africa will not reach the semifinals this time.
sentences.chinese: 非洲國家這次終與半決賽無緣。

sentences.english: " asked Chile's Mercurio newspaper after Brazil had eliminated the hosts in the semi-final.
sentences.chinese: 智利《水星》報在巴西隊半決賽淘汰東道主後發問。

sentences.english: Nadal beat Britain's Andy Murray in four sets in his semi-final.
sentences.chinese: 在半決賽中，納達爾在四局中擊敗英國的穆雷。

sentences.english: A 2 time ranking event semi-finalist, making his third appearance here at the crucible.
sentences.chinese: 兩次排名賽的半決賽，第三次在克魯斯堡亮相。

sentences.english: The semi-finals and final ares scheduled for March 19 and 20.
sentences.chinese: 半決賽和決賽3月19日和20日舉行最後戰神。

sentences.english: The last time the sides met in the competition was at the semi-final stage in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 兩隊最近一次在聯賽盃交手是在1992年的半決賽。

sentences.english: I saw him play in the semi-finals.
sentences.chinese: 我看見他闖進了半決賽。

definition: to defend the crown (in sports championship)
